sentences.en: All of this should give new urgency to Arab-Israeli peacemaking.
sentences.cn: 所有的这些都给阿拉伯-以色列和平调停传达了新的紧急信号。

sentences.en: Clearly the Kremlin would like to be the one to broker a breakthrough in the Arab-Israeli peace negotiations.
sentences.cn: 显而易见，克里姆林宫希望在这次阿以和谈中发挥作用，促成突破性进展。

sentences.en: The Arab-Israeli conflict should no longer be used to distract the people of Arab nations from other problems.
sentences.cn: 阿拉伯和以色列间的冲突不应该再成为阿拉伯人民关注的焦点。
